date.description: Budget allocation date representing the planned budget for the given period

material_number.description: Material or SKU code for which the budgeted values are defined

material_description.description: Full SKU description corresponding to the material number

channel.description: Distribution channel for which the budget is planned ['AFTER MARKET', 'ENEOS', 'EXPORTS', 'INSTITUTIONAL', 'OEM']

region.description: Geographical region for which the budget is allocated ['East', 'North', 'South', 'West']

week.description: Week identifier within the financial year used for weekly budget allocation and tracking ['Week 1', 'Week 2', 'Week 3', 'Week 4', 'Week 5']

volume.description: Budgeted sales volume for the material for the given time period. Unit is Kilolitres (KL)

gsv.description: Budgeted Gross Sales Value for the material before discounts for the given period

discount.description: Budgeted discount amount planned for the material for the given period

nsv1.description: Budgeted Net Sales Value after planned discounts and before taxes; use this field for budget vs actual revenue comparisons.
